column4: I'm trying to upgrade my Ubuntu 8.04 server to 8.10. However, everytime after rebooting I can't reconnect using SSH - it just refuses the connection. Do I have to change anything before rebooting the server?
is the ssh server referenced in any runlevel to be started?
perhaps something before ssh is blocking and waiting for a timeout (?)
or was it perhaps generating keys, because started for the first time (?)
